name: fyrsmithlabs
description: Claude Code plugins for fyrsmithlabs project standards, workflows, cross-session memory, and design system compliance

plugins.name: fyrsmithlabs
plugins.description: Claude Code plugins for fyrsmithlabs project standards and workflows. Includes YAGNI/KISS enforcement, git-repo-standards, git-workflows with multi-agent consensus review, and GitHub planning integration.

plugins.name: contextd
plugins.description: Cross-session memory and learning for Claude Code. Provides semantic search, memory recording, checkpoints, error remediation, and multi-agent orchestration via the contextd MCP server.

plugins.name: terminal-elegance
plugins.description: Terminal Elegance design system compliance checking for FyrsmithLabs products. Audits CSS, templates, and documentation for hardcoded values, accessibility issues, and brand consistency.
